MCQ: What is the scientific study of life called?
Choices: a: Physics | b: Chemistry | c: Biology | d: Geology

MCQ: Which major theme in biology explains the unity and diversity of life?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Photosynthesis | c: Cellular Respiration | d: Genetics

MCQ: What allows organisms to move, grow, and reproduce?
Choices: a: Energy processing | b: Photosynthesis | c: Cellular Respiration | d: Genetics

MCQ: What is the term for the study of life at the molecular level of a cell?
Choices: a: Anatomy | b: Physiology | c: Molecular Biology | d: Ecology

MCQ: When did life on Earth emerge?
Choices: a: 1 million years ago | b: 3.7 billion years ago | c: 500 million years ago | d: 10,000 years ago
